Description:
Develop and maintain project schedules
Collaborate with project managers and engineering teams to establish project objectives, deliverables, and milestones.
Analyze project requirements, technical specifications, and scope documents to determine project timelines and critical path activities.
Conduct feasibility studies and resource allocation analyses to optimize project schedules and identify potential risks and constraints.
Monitor and track project progress, identifying deviations from the plan and recommending corrective actions to keep projects on track.
Generate regular progress reports,
Conduct risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies to address schedule-related risks.
Coordinate with project teams and project managers
Conduct post-project analysis to identify lessons learned and areas for improvement in the planning and scheduling process.
Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies related to project planning and scheduling.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in engineering or a related field. Advanced degree or certifications in project management or planning are a plus.
Proven experience 15 years as a planning engineer or in a similar role, preferably in engineering or construction projects. 
Proficiency in project management software such as Primavera P6, Microsoft Project, or equivalent.
